channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Molton Brown
channel.desc: Awaken your senses with fragrance experts Molton Brown, London's bath, body and beauty connoisseurs since 1973. Indulge in exquisitely crafted blends brought to you by Molton Brown, London.
